Text.Page: Basheek is waiting for <PCNAME> at the Verrak Fortress Platform.
<PCNAME> learned there's an engine room that controls the Black Core inside Verrak Fortress. To destroy the engine room, <PCNAME> disguised as a draakon.

This place is heavily guarded. An ordinary naga, such as I, can only come this far.

Anyplace beyond the platform is restricted. The only nagas permitted to enter are the ones that closely aid the draakons. I won't be any help from now on.

Past the Control Center you'll find Vogzu. He's waiting for you.

I assume your friend Elleon went into the fortress.

Most of the guards at the Control Center hurried to the fortress.

The fortress was already a difficult place to sneak in. Now, it's almost impossible. We should disguise as draakons."How do we do that?"

The disguise will take care of our looks, but what really matters is our smell.

Without changing our odor, it's only a matter of time before the guards realize that we're not draakons.

Go gather some Exodor Metal Fragments and Rotted Mucus. With those ingredients, I can make a perfect disguise.

That's everything we need.

This will make it very easy for us to get inside.

Buy the way, would you mind doing a favor before we enter the fortress?"What is it?"

Please defeat the wretches that betrayed my people.

Although they betrayed us, it's difficult for us to kill our own people.

I'll deliver the disguise to Jelena and Titus right away as soon as it is ready. I'll have them wait for you at the Dark Gate.
That won't be enough. I need all the materials to make the disguise.

Wait! Stop it! It's me, Titus.

I have a disguise ready for you as well.

So which shall it be?

A female Draakon is it?

This will only take a minute.

Let's see...

A male Draakon is it?

This will only take a minute.

Let's see...

This is it. Take this.

Can't stand the smell here, can you? Believe it or not, you'll smell a sweet scent if you're in disguise.

Use this and you'll look like a draakon.

Jelena is already on her way, so hurry.

This is it. Take this.

Can't stand the smell here, can you? Believe it or not, you'll smell a sweet scent if you're in disguise.

Use this and you'll look like a draakon.

Jelena is already on her way, so hurry.

Hey! What are you doing here!

Didn't you get Commander Lumikan's orders?

Go and find the intruders!

Over here! Thank the gods you're all right.

I never thought that this disguise would work so well.

Let's go and check this place out.
